vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐκδῐκ-ησις, εως, ἡ,
avenging, ἐ. ποιεῖσθαι to give satisfaction, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; ἐ. ποιεῖσθαί τινος obtain it from.., [Refs]; legal remedy, [Refs 6th c.AD+]; ἐ. ποιεῖν τινι avenge him, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
justice; vengeance; punishment
vengeance, punishment, retributive justice, Lk. 21:22; Rom. 12:19; 2Cor. 7:11; 1Pet. 2:14; ἐκδικησιν ποιειν, to vindicate, avenge, Lk. 18:7, 8; διδόναι ἐκδικησιν, to inflict vengeance, Acts 7:24; 2Thess. 1:8; Heb. 10:30*
